title: Ocean's.Trilogy.BlurayMUX.1080p.VC-1.DD.5.1
description:
This is a BlurayMUX of the following Bluray disk: Ocean's Trilogy

This trilogy is a collection of the following three movies:
1) Ocean's Eleven (2001)
2) Ocean's Twelve (2004)
3) Ocean's Thirteen (2007)

1) IMDB: http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0240772/

2) IMDB: http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0349903/

3) IMDB: http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0496806/


The content is a MUX, which means the audio.video streams are untouched, thus preserving the full, original quality of the content.
